explanation: [0-0] On a sunny day, three kids wearing yellow tops, white pants, and black helmets are on a green grass baseball field. The kid on the left holds a bat, the one in the middle stands with his hands behind his back, and the one at the top stands with his arms crossed. Two adult men are standing next to them. The one on the left is wearing a black top and beige shorts, while the one on the right is wearing a white top and black pants. There's a caption in white letters on a red background at the bottom: "COACH TOLD HIM TO RUN FAST, SO HE DID THIS 😂," and a white caption in the upper right corner: "@TABBYRODRIGUEZ/TWITTER."

[0-8] First, the kid in the middle swings his arms and walks forward slowly. The kid with the bat on the lower left extends his right leg and taps the ground on his right with both hands holding the bat. The red caption disappears. A man in a red shirt walks out from the left, holding a bat in his right hand. The man in red walks next to the kid in the middle, puts his left hand on the kid's shoulder, and walks a few steps forward. The kid in the middle speeds up slightly, then stops, turns sideways, and pushes the man in red's hand away with his right shoulder. The man in red lets go, walks away, and retreats to the left.
